titles.title: Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Price (GA) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects a majority Member to the House Committees on Armed Services, Government Reform, and to Veterans' Affairs.
